tutors.name: Matthew C.
tutors.title: B.S. in Applied Mathematics & Physics
tutors.bio: Former USCSA athlete with Bachelor in Applied Mathematics and Physics. Specializes in STEM subjects for student athletes. Matt (Cooch) understands the demanding schedule of competitive athletics and has developed unique teaching methods that work around training and competition schedules.

testimonials.quote: Matt helped me master chemistry while balacing off season dryland. His flexible scheduling saved my GPA!
Cooch was great! I missed school while training abroad and was able to schedule a late night session with him.

tutors.name: Jeremy J
tutors.title: B.S. in Mathematics
tutors.bio: Jeremy Jakob currently teaches math at the Winter Sports School during the summer and coaches for Park City Ski & Snowboard during the ski season. A former ski racer on the Park City Ski Team and alumnus of the WSS, Jeremy went on to earn a degree in Mathematics from the University of Utah. Equally passionate about academics and sport, he believes true excellence comes from pursuing both without compromising one for the other. Through Athletic Minds, Jeremyâ€™s goal is to empower athletes, helping them to reach their athletic dreams while also achieving their academic goals.
